content.eamr: ( ing-0 "2 (9 inch)  pie shells, baked" )
( ing-1 "3 (8 ounce) packages cream cheese, softened" )
( ing-2 "1/2 cup white sugar" )
( ing-3 "1 teaspoon vanilla extract" )
( ing-4 "2 eggs" )
( ing-5 "1 cup sour cream" )
( ing-6 "3 tablespoons white sugar" )
( ing-7 "2 cups sliced fresh strawberries" )

content.text: 0) Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).
content.eamr:
( inst-0 / R
	:inform ( ac-0-0 "Preheat"@3:10 / AC
		:ppt ( tool-0-0 "oven"@11:15 / TOOL )
		:heat ( temp-0-0 "350 degrees F"@19:32 / TEMPERATURE )
		:heat ( temp-0-1 "175 degrees C"@34:47 / TEMPERATURE )
	)
)

content.text: 1) In a medium mixing bowl, whip cream cheese until fluffy.
content.eamr:
( inst-1 / R
	:inform ( ac-1-0 "whip"@28:32 / AC
		:ppt ( ing-1 "cream cheese"@33:45 / FOOD )
		:until ( cond-1-0 "until fluffy"@46:58 / CONDITION_CLAUSE )
		:loc ( tool-1-0 "a medium mixing bowl"@6:26 / TOOL )
	)
)

content.text: 2) Add 1/2 cup sugar and vanilla extract.
content.eamr:
( inst-2 / R
	:inform ( ac-2-0 "Add"@3:6 / AC
		:ppt ( ing-2 "1/2 cup sugar"@7:20 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-3 "vanilla extract"@25:40 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( NULL / FOOD )
	)
)

content.text: 5) Beat until all ingredients are thoroughly combined.
7) Bake in preheated oven for 20 minutes.
content.eamr:
( inst-7 / R
	:inform ( ac-7-0 "Bake"@3:7 / AC
		:loc ( tool-7-0 "preheated oven"@11:25 / TOOL )
		:duration ( dur-7-0 "20 minutes"@30:40 / DUR )
		:ppt ( NULL / FOOD )
	)
)

content.text: 8) Remove and let stand for 5 minutes.
9) In a small bowl, combine sour cream and 3 tablespoons sugar.
content.eamr:
( inst-9 / R
	:inform ( ac-9-0 "combine"@-1:-1 / AC
		:ppt ( ing-5 "sour cream"@-1:-1 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-6 "3 tablespoons sugar"@-1:-1 / FOOD )
		:loc ( tool-9-0 "a small bowl"@-1:-1 / TOOL )
	)
)

content.text: 10) Mix well, then spread half of mixture over each pie.
12) Place pies in oven for 15 minutes.
content.eamr:
( inst-12 / R
	:inform ( ac-12-0 "Place"@4:9 / AC
		:ppt ( "pies"@10:14 / FOOD )
		:gol ( tool-12-0 "oven"@18:22 / TOOL )
		:duration ( dur-12-0 "15 minutes"@27:37 / DUR )
	)
)

content.text: 14) Before serving, top each pie with 1 cup of strawberries.
content.eamr:
( inst-14 / R
	:inform ( ac-14-0 "top"@20:23 / AC
		:gol ( "each pie"@24:32 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-7 "1 cup of strawberries"@38:59 / FOOD )
		:duration ( cond-14-0 "Before serving"@4:18 / CONDITION_CLAUSE )
	)
)
